EnumParameter.Name: sub_frame_length
EnumParameter.Description: Length of a sub-frame for each DRP gain computation. Class 1 parameter. Default=8

IntegerParameter.Name: look_ahead_length
IntegerParameter.Description: Length of look-ahead buffer. Class 1 parameter. Default=8

EnumParameter.Name: sub_bands_number
EnumParameter.Description: Number of sub-bands. Class 1 parameter. Default=4

IntegerParameter.Name: dc_remover_shift
IntegerParameter.Description: DC remover high-pass filter coefficient. Class 2 parameter. Default=7

FixedPointParameter.Name: band12_coef
FixedPointParameter.Description: Coefficient for cross-over filter separating sub-bands 1 and 2. Class 1 parameter. Default=-13573

FixedPointParameter.Name: band23_coef
FixedPointParameter.Description: Coefficient for cross-over filter separating sub-bands 2 and 3. Class 1 parameter. Default=0

FixedPointParameter.Name: band34_coef
FixedPointParameter.Description: Coefficient for cross-over filter separating sub-bands 3 and 4. Class 1 parameter. Default=13573

FixedPointParameter.Name: rms_attack
FixedPointParameter.Description: Attack time for the RMS level measurement in sub-band. Class 1 parameter. Default=17584

FixedPointParameter.Name: rms_release
FixedPointParameter.Description: Release time for the RMS level measurement in sub-band. Class 1 parameter. Default=1598

FixedPointParameter.Name: gain_attack
FixedPointParameter.Description: Attack time for the gain smoothing in sub-band. Class 1 parameter. Default=10803

FixedPointParameter.Name: gain_release
FixedPointParameter.Description: Release time for the gain smoothing in sub-band. Class 1 parameter. Default=649

FixedPointParameter.Name: la
FixedPointParameter.Description: Power threshold for upper knee point A in sub-band. Class 1 parameter. Default=-17920

FixedPointParameter.Name: lb
FixedPointParameter.Description: Power threshold for upper knee point B in sub-band. Class 1 parameter. Default=-8960

FixedPointParameter.Name: g_comp
FixedPointParameter.Description: Output compensation gain at knee point B in sub-band. Class 1 parameter. Default=2048

FixedPointParameter.Name: r_inf_a
FixedPointParameter.Description: Slope of compression profile for input level less than LA in sub-band. Class 1 parameter. Default=512

FixedPointParameter.Name: r_ab
FixedPointParameter.Description: Slope of compression profile for input level LA and LB in sub-band. Class 1 parameter. Default=256

FixedPointParameter.Name: r_bo
FixedPointParameter.Description: Slope of compression profile for input level greater than LB in sub-band. Class 1 parameter. Default=76
